review: Product is not compatible with s6 it works fine if you are looking at pics and going through your phone but if your trying to watch a movie it will work for a little bit then the volume stops working I Google it and I'm not the only one have the same problem.

review: Arrived quickly and as advertised. A great price point for a solid product.
